title: Mobile-Based Elementary Language Intensive Short-Term Program: Iterative Execution and Instance Design

context.additional_context: Repetitive learning environment using only smartphones with a flexible learner-instructor matching system

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% word recognition accuracy in mobile environments within one week.
Learners achieve over 70% of daily learning objectives through real-time formative assessments (quizzes).
Learners complete personalized content three or more times via individualized learning paths (instances) during iterative execution.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
